import React from 'react'; import './style.css' class Piano extends React.Component { state = { active: false } activate = event => { console.log(event.target.dataset.note) // if (this.props.activeNotes.includes(event.target.dataset.note)) { // } } render() { console.log(this.props.activeNotes) const activeColor = this.state.active ? 'black' : 'white' return (
) } } export default Piano;
